00001 /*
00002  * gtrm_client.c -- the body of the client.
00003  *
00004  *       The GNU trm client sends a request to a GNU
00005  *       trm server for a terminal random message.

00027 /* standard includes. */
00028 #include <stdio.h>
00029 #include <stdlib.h>
00030 #include <unistd.h>
00031 #include <netdb.h>
00032 #include <netinet/in.h>
00033 
00034 /* my includes. */
00035 #include "program_typedefs.h"
00036 
00037 /* externs. */
00038 /* functions. */
00039 extern void parse_options (int, char **);
00040 extern void log_report (FILE *, unique, unique);
00041 extern bool client_run (struct hostent *, uint16_t);
00042 
00043 /* command line options. */
00044 extern options_info *fop;
00045 
00046 /* global messages. */
00047 static unique client_failed = "client_run() failed to run.";
00048 
00049 /* functions. */
00050 /* the body of the client. */
00051 int
00052 main (int argc, char *argv[])
00053 {
00054   /* keep client_run() state. */
00055   bool client_state = true;
00056 
00057     /*** parse all input command line options. ***/
00058   parse_options (argc, argv);
00059 
00060     /*** try to run the client. ***/
00061   client_state = client_run (fop->hostinfo, fop->port);
00062 
00063   /* failed to run the client? */
00064   if (!client_state && fop->verbose)
00065     fprintf (stderr, "%s\n", client_failed);
00066 
00067   /* client exits. */
00068   exit (client_state ? EXIT_SUCCESS : EXIT_FAILURE);
00069 }
